response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance and potential for growth, which I believe could be of great interest to you. Considering its rarity and the benefits it offers, I am extending a special invitation to purchase this product at a price of $2,000,000. I am confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Let's discuss how we can make this happen.", "product_price": 2000000}
